div.p: Remote Support If you need technical support please check with your teachers first. If they are unable to help please click here: https://www.frontenac249.org/district/technology/tech-support/ Wifi Access Please see the maps below with information on where you should be able to connect to the school WIFI from your vehicles if necessary. School owned devices should connect automatically. The Frontenac Guest network is open for non-school owned devices.

article.class: post-1699 post type-post status-publish format-standard sticky hentry category-uncategorized

a.title: USD 249 closed for the remainder of year

h4.a: USD 249 closed for the remainder of year

div.p: At 4:00 today, Governor Laura Kelly announced the closing of all Kansas Schools through the remainder of the school year. With this recommendation as well as our own concern for the safety and well-being of our students and families, USD 249 Frontenac Schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. We understand this brings many questions and concerns from our community. District Leadership in partnership with… Continue Reading USD 249 closed for the remainder of year

a.title: Parents — below you will find the latest KDHE guidance on travel and quarantines

h4.a: Parents — below you will find the latest KDHE guidance on travel and quarantines

div.div: If you are traveling to or have traveled to these areas please follow the quarantine guidelines below. Please also note that this list will be updated frequently and any additional letters will be sent out as they are released.
